name: Base64.Decode

unions.name: Decoder
unions.comment: A decoder type that knows how to decode a Base64 string.

unions.name: Error
unions.comment:
Errors that can occur during a decoding:

    Base64.Decode.decode Base64.Decode.string "a===" == Err ValidationError

    Base64.Decode.decode Base64.Decode.string "/Ng9" == Err InvalidByteSequence

values.name: decode
values.comment:
Turn a `Decoder` into a certain value.

Decoding can fail, see `Error`.
values.type: Base64.Decode.Decoder a -> String.String -> Result.Result Base64.Decode.Error a

values.name: map
values.comment: Transforms the value produced by a decoder.

name: Base64.Encode

unions.name: Encoder
unions.comment:
A type that knows how to encode certain data into a
Base64 string.

values.name: encode
values.comment: Turns an `Encoder` into a Base64 string.
